music.title: Music
music.description: Enjoy live performances and studio tracks by Adam Nukorev.
music.audio_not_supported: Your browser does not support audio playback.

text.part1: MedicoreFly is a saxophonist, multi-instrumentalist, and session musician. A person fully devoted to music, he immerses his audience in a wave of groove and style, performing instrumental compositions in genres:
text.part2: Through the saxophone, he reveals new facets of musical perception in each composition, unconfined by genre boundaries, reimagining each melody and making every track unique.
text.part3: The repertoire of mFly is a complete reflection of his musical taste and personal playlist of favorite songs that inspire his creative journey.
text.mission: The main message behind mFly’s music is to share beauty with the world and stay true to oneself.
